column1: # Title : Lines for ternary diagram domains
# Description : dataset for various geological classification domains in ternary diagram using ggtern package
# QFL: Dickinson model from Dickinson & al. (1983)
# QmFLt: Dickinson model from Dickinson & al. (1983)
# Values are reported form references or using WebPlotDigitizer (http://arohatgi.info/WebPlotDigitizer/beta/)
# x = left corner y = top corner z = right corner
